description:
Description


Introducing HEVE BLUE 60 Unbleached, Biodegradable 100% Cotton Pads.
Made with 100% natural cotton, these pads are not only gentle on the skin but also environmentally friendly.
Unbleached and biodegradable, they leave no harmful residues behind, making them the perfect choice for your daily skincare routine.
 
How To Use

Step 1:
Use as a wiping toner to gently and effectively remove dead skin cells, impurities, and sebum without irritating the skin.

Step 2:
Apply as a skin pack for extended hydration and soothing care.

Step 3:
Use as an eye and lip makeup remover or cleansing water to thoroughly and gently remove makeup without irritation.

description: Description- A cotton pad that delivers sufficient moisture to the skin even with 1/3 less toner than usual.- The thin thickness makes it adhere well to the skin and match well as a sheet mask.- No itchy cotton pads with fluff, clean use with pulp+rayon material.How To UseWet the cotton pad with skincare products and gently wipe it along the skin texture or apply it to the skin to use it as a sheet mask.
extra_description: Wet the cotton pad with skincare products and gently wipe it along the skin texture or apply it to the skin to use it as a sheet mask.

description:
Description
- Pair with Essence Toner for Maximum delivery of active ingredients! - The cotton pad uses sponge pulp so there is no need to worry about lint, also reduces toner usage by 1/3.- Pyunkang Yul Cotton Pads are soft, versatile cotton pads perfect for removing makeup, applying toners and other essential products, and soothing the skin. - The pads are made of 100% certified organic cotton and contain no harmful chemicals or dyes. - These pads have a unique, triple-weave structure that makes it easier to spread products and ensures the skin stays optimally hydrated. - The Pyunkang Yul Cotton Pads are suitable for all skin types and provide a soft, supple, and hydrated skin.- The beauty pads save your toner by preventing the pads to absorb excessive toner.

Suggested Use

After washing face, apply 1/3 amount of toner than usual onto the cotton pads. Gently wipe your face. (Or apply toner to cotton pads and use it like mask sheets.)

reviews.title: In Love!
reviews.content: I cannot believe I haven't used these instead of cotton rounds! These are perfect for use with serums for spot treatments or quick masks. And it allows the product to work on the skin instead of getting soaked into the cotton. I bought 4 boxes at once! Very happy with the product.

reviews.title: good
reviews.content: basic cotton pads for skincare or makeup removal

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.content: I usually use the conventional cotton pad from the supermarket, and always go for something cheap. But this cotton pad is by far the best I have ever used. I soaked up a really good amount of fluid or toner, and after applying onto my skin, it stayed well. I will definitely repurchase this!

reviews.title: thin and strong
reviews.content: thin pad and prevents wasting skincare liquid to soak up.

reviews.title: Very light
reviews.content: Very light on the skin and not harsh and good for toners suitable for sensitive skin
